About

Iâ€™m Tammy and I am a teaching assistant for CS 61A. You can find my teaching ratings here and my personal website here.

This semester, I am teaching CS Scholars sections. Please only attend the following sections if you are part of the CS Scholars Program.

Sections:
015 Lab: Tuesday 11am-12:30pm, 275 Soda
115 Discussion: Thursday 11am-12:30pm, 242 Dwinelle

Office Hours:
Wednesday 12-1pm, B6 Evans

Quizzes posted on this site are solely used to evaluate the progress of students in my discussion section and have no impact on your 61A grade.

You can contact me through email, tammynguyen@berkeley.edu, or through this anonymous form. Feel free to leave feedback about my teaching, this website, or whatever else is on your mind!
